name: CellularSettings
desc: Constraints on the user’s cellular networking settings.

items.name: var lockAppCellularData: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from changing cellular data settings.

items.name: static let lockAppCellularData: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the constraint that locks the cellular data setting.

items.name: var lockCellularPlan: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from changing their cellular plan.

items.name: static let lockCellularPlan: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the constraint that locks the user’s cellular plan.

items.name: var lockESIM: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from changing their eSIM settings.

items.name: static let lockESIM: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the constraint that locks the user’s eSIM settings.
